submission:
from collections import defaultdict

class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diff_freq = defaultdict(int)
        max_diff_freq = defaultdict(int)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            l = nums[i]
            r = nums[n-1-i]
            diff = abs(l-r)
            max_diff = max(l, k-l, r, k-r)
            diff_freq[diff] += 1
            max_diff_freq[max_diff] += 1
        
        diff_freq = sorted(item for item in diff_freq.items())
        max_diff_freq = sorted(item for item in max_diff_freq.items())
        
        ans = n
        max_diff_idx = 0
        two_change_count = 0
        for (diff, freq) in diff_freq:
            while max_diff_idx < len(max_diff_freq) and diff > max_diff_freq[max_diff_idx][0]:
                two_change_count += max_diff_freq[max_diff_idx][1]
                max_diff_idx += 1
            
            zero_change_count = freq
            one_change_count = n // 2 - freq - two_change_count
            change_count = one_change_count + 2 * two_change_count
            ans = min(ans, change_count)
        
        return ans
